resources.string:
Hi, my name is Dinesh. 

I work for Bell as a QA Tester. 

I want to be a Software Developer. 

I love playing cricket and Playstation games. 

I speak 4 languages: English, French, Hindi, Punjabi. 

I have visited Austalia and US. 

I am from India and live in Montreal. 

I love India and Canada. These are my two homes. 

India, because it is my home Country and I love being there and Canada, because here, i met so many people and learnt their beautiful culture. 

I hope I explore every part of these two Countries before I die. 

Merry christmas and a happy new year 2021.
